mapper.select:
SELECT WD.id AS workingDiaryId, WD.user_code AS userCode, users.name, working_start_datetime AS workingStartDatetime, working_end_datetime AS workingEndDatetime, working_contents AS workingContents FROM pl_center.working_diary AS WD INNER JOIN users ON WD.user_code = users.user_code WHERE working_start_datetime BETWEEN #{nowYearMonth} AND LAST_DAY(#{nowYearMonth})
WHERE user_code = ${userCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO working_diary(user_code, working_start_datetime, working_end_datetime, working_contents) VALUES (#{userCode}, #{workingStartDatetime}, #{workingEndDatetime}, #{workingContents})
